body:
I know... This is off topic, not related to avicus... and i have been making a lot of threads.. blah blah blah, But dis is my last one for dat week ;c

Anyways, Smidalt and other youtubers on avicus (Sometimes) like to do little motages... or something. So i thought i will be cool if they had a pretty beefy clip for their FANTASTIC moment ;)
I have created... this

If this gets locked im fine as i see this as spam ;c, Anyways hope you enyoy!

(btw this isnt in my videos post cause it doesnt fit in :P)
